com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.loaders.md5
Class MD5Model

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.loaders.md5.MD5Model

public class MD5Model
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an MD5 (Doom 3) skinned model. Note: The normal interpolation implementation is experimental. Using it will incur a greater CPU overhead, and correct normals for dynamically lit models are not guaranteed at this time. Expert contribution for this code is encouraged, please email Dave if you're interested in helping.

Author:
Mario Zechner , Nathan Sweet , Dave Clayton
